subject: From The Desk Of: Mr.Musa Be
body:
From The Desk Of: Mr.Musa Bello Buhari
Director of finance and Audit Unit.
Debt Management Commission,(DMC)
Office of the Presidency
ATTN: ,
I am Mr. Musa Bello Buhari, Director of finance and Audit Unit Debt Management Commission,(DMC) Office of the Presidency.
I just assume office last week as the new Director of finance and Audit Unit Debt Management Commission and I came across your payment file on my desk after our investigation. We discovered the reason why you have not received your funds all these years. We decided to contact you. Now I would like you to ask yourself the reason why you have not yet received your funds after you have paid all the fees that you were not supposed to pay because as I was going through your payment file, I found out that you are not owing any amount. So you should ask yourself why after paying all the fees you have not yet received your fund up till now .
Did you authorize a man called Mr. Geoffrey Dennis from USA to receive your funds,he has contacted my office to release your funds to him and I do not know who sent him, could it be you? am wondering why he knows that your fund is under our care and I also want to know if you are the one that sent this man called Mr. Geoffrey Dennis to contact my office and ask for the release of your fund to him, in his email he said that you die of covid-19 year 2020 and before you die you instructed him to receive your fund as your next of kin and business partner.
Let me be honest to you, you are aware that you are not the rightful beneficiary to this fund. The fund originated from someone who executed a contract here, but your name was used as the next of kin to this fund. So as a matter of fact, if you are ready to receive this fund,I will want you to forward us your full information to me if you are ready to receive the fund.
Moreover, I want you to  understand that if someone has a problem and you do not take out time to find out the root cause of your problem you will not be able to get a solution to that problem. So I need you to contact me back with your full information so that I will explain to you why you have not received your funds and what you need to do to solve this problem.
The total amount of funds that we are talking about is USD$20.5Million.
I look forward to your urgent response, If You Are Still Alive.
Regards,
Mr. Musa Bello Buhari.

subject: Re:   From The Desk Of: Mr.Musa Be
body:
Hello Mr. Musa Bello Buhari,

Thank you for reaching out to me and congratulations on your new position as the Director of Finance and Audit Unit Debt Management DMC Office. I must say, your message has left me quite surprised.

I'm not aware of any funds that I should be receiving, nor do I recall authorizing a Mr. Geoffrey Dennis from the USA to receive any funds on my behalf. It's quite puzzling how he would know about these funds and claim that I have passed away.

As for the fund originating from someone who executed a contract here, could you please provide more details? Who is this person and what was the nature of this contract?

You mentioned that my name was used as the next of kin to this fund. How did this happen? And why was my name chosen?

Lastly, you asked for my full information. Could you please specify what kind of information you need? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Barbara

subject: Re: From The Desk Of: Mr.Musa Be
body:
From The Desk Of: Mr. Musa Bello Buhari
Director of finance and Audit Unit.
Debt Management Commission,(DMC)
Office of the Presidency

Attention: Barbara,

The Debt Management Commission, wished to inform you that we have received
your mail regarding your payment sum of USD$20.5Million dated Fri, Feb 9,
7:27â€¯AM 2024 noted. Also, we are happy to hear that you are alive, and you
did not know Mr. Geoffrey Dennis or authorized him to receive your payment
sum of USD$20.5Million on your behalf or as your next of kin.

According to our investigation we discover that Mr. Geoffrey Dennis from
Idaho USA, who claim to be your next of kin or business partner knows about
your fund through the former director of finance and Audit Unit and some
government official , who serve under the past government who trying to use
Mr.Geoffrey Dennis from Idaho USA to divert your fund to their own personal
use before their evil plans was discovered by this present government under
the leadership of His Excellence Senator Bola Ahmed Tinubu, the new
President of the Federal Republic of Nigeria who is zero to corruption, he
has mandate Our office to make sure we release your fund to you and every
other beneficiary on or before 29/02/2024.

However, for us to be sure that we are dealing directly to the rightful
beneficiary of the fund. And to enable us to commerce the processing of
your payment, you are advice to reconfirmed the below information's to us
such as :

Your Full Name:.....................................

Your Direct Mobile Phone Number:...........................

Your Home Address..................................

Your Country............................................

Your Id Card/International Passport....................

Your Occupation.........................

Also, you are to choose any of the below mode of payment:

1) ATM CARD MASTER CARD.

2) BANK TO BANK WIRE TRANSFER.

3) ONLINE BANK TRANSFER.

Kindly get back to us as soon as you receive this mail.
Regards,

Mr. Musa Bello Buhari.

subject: Re: From The Desk Of: Mr.Musa Be
body:
Hello Mr. Musa Bello Buhari,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. It's quite surprising to hear about this situation with Mr. Geoffrey Dennis, I don't recall ever authorizing him or anyone else to receive any payment on my behalf.

I'm curious, how did Mr. Dennis come into contact with the former director of finance and Audit Unit? And how was it discovered that he was trying to divert funds?

As for the mode of payment, could you please provide more details about each option? What are the pros and cons of ATM CARD MASTER CARD, BANK TO BANK WIRE TRANSFER, and ONLINE BANK TRANSFER?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Barbara

subject: Re: From The Desk Of: Mr.Musa Be
body:
*From The Desk Of: Mr. Musa Bello BuhariDirector of finance and
AuditUnit.Debt Management Commission,(DMC)Office of the
PresidencyAttention: Mrs.Barbara  ,I have received your mail, dated Wed,
Feb 14, 2024 noted.reference to your question, it is after our
investigation we discover that some corrupt officials/former director of
finance and Audit Unit is trying to use Mr. Geoffrey Dennis from USA to
divert your funds to their offshore account as unclaimed fund.Because the
fund has stay long in a government payment system without a due process.We
are happy to hear that you are alive, and you did not know Mr. Geoffrey
Dennis or authorized him to receive your payment sum of USD$20.5Million on
your behalf or as your next of kin.Regards to the details about each option
and pros and cons of ATM CARD MASTER CARD, BANK TO BANK WIRE TRANSFER, and
ONLINE BANK TRANSFER? there are all good but it depend on your choice on
how you like to receive your payment that will OK for you for me i will
advice to choose ATM CARD MASTER CARD because through ATM CARD MASTER CARD
it will programmed for you to transfer your fund to your bank in your
country very easy without any problem.Please kindly get back to me as soon
as you receive this mail.Regards,Mr. Musa Bello Buhari. *

subject: Re: From The Desk Of: Mr.Musa Be
body:
Hello Mr. Musa Bello Buhari,

Thank you for your message. I'm quite surprised to hear about this situation with Mr. Geoffrey Dennis and the funds. I must admit, it's all a bit confusing to me.

Could you please explain more about these different options for receiving the payment? How does the ATM CARD MASTER CARD work exactly? And what are the steps involved in BANK TO BANK WIRE TRANSFER and ONLINE BANK TRANSFER?

I'm also curious, how did my name come up in relation to these funds? 

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Barbara
